template.template_content:
<forum> <name>{$forum_data['name']}</name> <id>{$forum_data['id']}</id> <url>{parse url="showforum={$forum_data['id']}" seotitle="{{$forum_data['name_seo']}" template="showforum" base="public"}</url>
<if test="$forum_data['show_rules'] == 2"> <rules> <title>{$forum_data['rules_title']}</title> <text>{$forum_data['rules_text']}</text> </rules> </if> <if test="$forum_data['show_rules'] == 1"> <rules> <title>{$forum_data['rules_title']}</title> <url>{parse url="showforum={$forum_data['id']}&act=SR" base="public"}</url> </rules> </if> <if test="is_array( $sub_forum_data ) AND count( $sub_forum_data )"> <subforums> <foreach loop="subforums:$sub_forum_data as $_data"> <if test="is_array( $_data['forum_data'] ) AND count( $_data['forum_data'] )"> <foreach loop="forums:$_data['forum_data'] as $forum_id => $forum_data"> <foreach loop="forums:$_data['forum_data'] as $forum_id => $forum_data"> <forum> <id>{$forum_data['id']}</id> <name>{$forum_data['name']}</name> <url>{parse url="showforum={$forum_data['id']}" seotitle="{$forum_data['name_seo']}" template="showforum" base="public"}</url> <description>{$forum_data['description']}</description> <if test="$forum_data['redirect_on']"> <type>redirect</type> <else /> <type>{$forum_data['status']}</type> <topics>{$forum_data['topics']}</topics> <replies>{$forum_data['posts']}</replies> <lastpost> <if test="$forum_data['hide_last_info']"> <name>{$this->lang->words['f_protected']}</name> <else /> <date>{$forum_data['last_post']}</date> <name>{$forum_data['last_title']}</name> <id>{$forum_data['last_id']}</id> <url>{parse url="showtopic={$forum_data['last_id']}&view=getlastpost" base="public" template="showtopic" seotitle="{$forum_data['seo_last_title']}"}</url> <user> <if test="$forum_data['last_poster_id']"> <id>{$forum_data['last_poster_id']}</id> <name>{$forum_data['last_poster_name']}</name> <url>{parse url="showuser={$forum_data['last_poster_id']}" template="showuser" seotitle="{$forum_data['seo_last_name']}" base="public"}</url> <else /> <id>0</id> <name>{$this->settings['guest_name_pre']}{$forum_data['last_poster_name']}{$this->settings['guest_name_suf']}</name> <url></url> </if> </user> </if> </lastpost> </if> </forum> </foreach> </foreach> </if> </foreach> </subforums> </if> <if test="is_array( $announce_data ) AND count( $announce_data )"> <announcements> <foreach loop="announcements:$announce_data as $aid => $adata"> <announcement> <id>{$adata['announce_id']}</id> <title>{$adata['announce_title']}</title> <url>{parse url="showannouncement={$adata['announce_id']}&f={$forum_data['id']}" seotitle="%%{$adata['announce_title']}%%" template="showannouncement" base="public"}</url> <user> <id>{$adata['member_id']}</id> <name>{$adata['member_name']}</name> <url>{parse url="showuser={$adata['member_id']}" seotitle="{$adata['members_seo_name']}" template="showuser" base="public"}</url> </user> </announcement> </foreach> </announcements> </if> <topics> <if test="is_array( $topic_data ) AND count( $topic_data )"> <foreach loop="topics:$topic_data as $tid => $data"> <topic> <id>{$data['tid']}</id> <icon>{$data['folder_img']}</icon> <title>{$data['title']}</title> <description>{$data['description']}</description> <url>{parse url="showtopic={$data['tid']}" base="public" template="showtopic" seotitle="{$data['title_seo']}"}</url> <user> <id>{$data['starter_id']}</id> <name>{$data['starter_name']}</name> <url>{parse url="showuser={$data['starter_id']}" seotitle="{$data['seo_first_name']}" template="showuser" base="public"}</url> </user> <replies>{$data['_posts']}</replies> <views>{$data['views']}</views> <lastpost> <date>{$data['last_post']}</date> <url>{parse url="showtopic={$data['tid']}&view=getlastpost" seotitle="{$data['title_seo']}" template="showtopic" base="public"}</url> <user> <id>{$data['last_poster_id']}</id> <name>{$data['last_poster_name']}</name> <url>{parse url="showuser={$data['last_poster_id']}" seotitle="{$data['seo_last_name']}" template="showuser" base="public"}</url> </user> </lastpost> <if test="$data['topic_hasattach']"> <attachments> <url>{$this->settings['base_url']}app=forums&module=forums&section=attach&tid={$data['tid']}</url> <count>{parse expression="intval($data['topic_hasattach'])"}</count> </attachments> </if> <if test="is_array( $data['pages'] ) AND count( $data['pages'] )"> <pagination> <foreach loop="$data['pages'] as $page"> <page> <url>{parse url="showtopic={$data['tid']}&st={$page['st']}" seotitle="{$data['title_seo']}" template="showtopic" base="public"}</url> <number>{$page['page']}</number> </page> </foreach> </pagination> </if> </topic> </foreach> </if> </topics>
{$forum_data['SHOW_PAGES']}
<if test="!$this->settings['no_au_forum']"> <activeusers> <total>{parse expression="($active_user_data['members'] + $active_user_data['guests'] + $active_user_data['anon'] )"}</total> <guests>{$active_user_data['guests']}</guests> <anonymous>{$active_user_data['anon']}</anonymous> <users> <if test="is_array( $active_user_data['names'] ) AND count( $active_user_data['names'] )"> <foreach loop="$active_user_data['names'] as $p => $r"> <user> <id>{$r['id']}</id> <name>{$r['p_start']}{$r['name']}{$r['p_end']}</name> <url>{parse url="showuser={$r['id']}" seotitle="{$r['seo']}" template="showuser" base="public"}</url> </user> </foreach> </if> </users> </if> </activeusers> </forum>

<if test="cats_forums:|:is_array( $cat_data ) AND count( $cat_data )"> <categories> <foreach loop="categories:$cat_data as $_data"> <if test="cat_has_forums:|:is_array( $_data['forum_data'] ) AND count( $_data['forum_data'] )"> <category> <id>{$_data['cat_data']['id']}</id> <name>{$_data['cat_data']['name']}</name> <url>{parse url="showforum={$_data['cat_data']['id']}" seotitle="{$_data['cat_data']['name_seo']}" template="showforum" base="public"}</url> <forums> <foreach loop="forums:$_data['forum_data'] as $forum_id => $forum_data"> <forum> <id>{$forum_data['id']}</id> <name>{$forum_data['name']}</name> <url>{parse url="showforum={$forum_data['id']}" seotitle="{$forum_data['name_seo']}" template="showforum" base="public"}</url> <description><!#^#|CDATA|{$forum_data['description']}|#^#]></description> <if test="$forum_data['redirect_on']"> <type>redirect</type> <else /> <type>{$forum_data['status']}</type> <topics>{$forum_data['topics']}</topics> <replies>{$forum_data['posts']}</replies> <lastpost> <if test="$forum_data['hide_last_info']"> <name>{$this->lang->words['f_protected']}</name> <else /> <date>{$forum_data['last_post']}</date> <name>{$forum_data['last_title']}</name> <id>{$forum_data['last_id']}</id> <url>{parse url="showtopic={$forum_data['last_id']}&view=getlastpost" base="public" template="showtopic" seotitle="{$forum_data['seo_last_title']}"}</url> <user> <if test="$forum_data['last_poster_id']"> <id>{$forum_data['last_poster_id']}</id> <name>{$forum_data['last_poster_name']}</name> <url>{parse url="showuser={$forum_data['last_poster_id']}" template="showuser" seotitle="{$forum_data['seo_last_name']}" base="public"}</url> <else /> <id>0</id> <name>{$this->settings['guest_name_pre']}{$forum_data['last_poster_name']}{$this->settings['guest_name_suf']}</name> <url></url> </if> </user> </if> </lastpost> </if> <if test="$forum_data['show_subforums'] AND count( $forum_data['subforums'] ) AND $forum_data['show_subforums']"> <subforums> <foreach loop="subforums:$forum_data['subforums'] as $__id => $__data"> <subforum> <id>{$__data[0]}</id> <name>{$__data[1]}</name> <url>{parse url="showforum=" seotitle="{$__data[2]}" template="showforum" base="public"}</url> </subforum> </foreach> </subforums> </if> </forum> </foreach> </forums> </category> </if> </foreach> </categories> </if> <statistics> <posts>{$stats['info']['total_posts']}</posts> <members>{$stats['info']['mem_count']}</members> <user> <id>{$stats['info']['last_mem_id']}</id> <name>{$stats['info']['last_mem_name']}</name> <url>{parse url="{$stats['info']['last_mem_link']}" template="showuser" seotitle="%%{$stats['info']['last_mem_name']}%%" base="public"}</url> </user> <onlinerecord>{$stats['info']['most_online']}</onlinerecord> </statistics> <activeusers> <total>{$stats['TOTAL']}</total> <guests>{$stats['GUESTS']}</guests> <anonymous>{$stats['ANON']}</anonymous> <users>{parse expression="implode( ",", count($stats['NAMES']) ? $stats['NAMES'] : array() )"}</users> </activeusers> <events> <if test="is_array( $calendar_events )"> {parse expression="implode( ",", count($calendar_events) ? $calendar_events : array() )"} <else /> $calendar_events </if> </events> <birthdays> <if test="$birthdays !== FALSE AND is_array( $birthdays ) AND count( $birthdays )"> <total>{$birthdays['count']}</total> <users>{parse expression="implode( ",", count($birthdays['users']) ? $birthdays['users'] : array() )"}</users> </if> </birthdays>

{parse js_module="topic"}

{$this->lang->words['announce_title']}: {$announce['announce_title']}

    {parse replacement="user_online"} {parse replacement="user_offline"}  
    {$author['members_display_name']}{parse template="user_popup" group="global" params="$author['member_id']"}
    {$author['members_display_name']}

    {parse template="userInfoPane" group="global" params="$author, 'announcement', array()"}
    {$announce['announce_post']}

<poll> <title>{$poll['poll_question']}</title> <if test="$showResults"><totalvotes>{$poll['_totalVotes']}</totalvotes></if> <public>{$this->settings['poll_allow_public']}</public>
<questions> <foreach loop="$pollData as $questionID => $questionData"> <question> <title>{$pollData[ $questionID ]['question']}</title> <if test="! $this->settings['allow_result_view'] AND ! $this->memberData['member_id']"> <error>{$this->lang->words['poll_noview_guest']}</error> <else /> <results> <foreach loop="$pollData[ $questionID ]['choices'] as $choiceID => $choiceData"> <choice>{$choiceData['choice']}</choice> <if test="$showResults"> <selected><if test="is_array( $choiceData['voters'] ) AND in_array( $this->memberData['member_id'], array_keys( $choiceData['voters'] ) )">1<else />0</if></selected> <votes>{$choiceData['votes']}</votes> <percent>{$choiceData['percent']}%</percent>
<if test="$poll['poll_view_voters'] AND is_array( $choiceData['voters'] ) AND $this->settings['poll_allow_public']"> <voters> <foreach loop="$choiceData['voters'] as $id => $member"> <user> <id>{$member['member_id']}</id> <name>{$member['members_colored_name']}</name> <url>{parse url="showuser=" base="public" seotitle="{$member['members_seo_name']}" template="showuser"}</url> </user> </foreach> </voters> </if> </if> </foreach> </results> </if> </question> </foreach> </questions> </poll>

<forum> <name>{$forum['name']}</name> <id>{$forum['id']}</id> <url>{parse url="showforum={$forum['id']}" seotitle="{{$forum['name_seo']}" template="showforum" base="public"}</url>
<if test="$forum['show_rules'] == 2"> <rules> <title>{$forum['rules_title']}</title> <text>{$forum['rules_text']}</text> </rules> </if> <if test="$forum_data['show_rules'] == 1"> <rules> <title>{$forum['rules_title']}</title> <url>{parse url="showforum={$forum['id']}&act=SR" base="public"}</url> </rules> </if>
<topic> <id>{$topic['tid']}</id> <title>{$topic['title']}</title> <description>{$topic['description']}</description> <url>{parse url="showtopic={$topic['tid']}" template="showtopic" seotitle="{$topic['title_seo']}" base="public"}</url>
{$displayData['poll_data']}
<posts> <if test="is_array( $post_data ) AND count( $post_data )"> <foreach loop="post_data:$post_data as $pid => $post"> <post> <id>{$post['post']['pid']}</id> <date>{parse date="$post['post']['post_date']" format="long"}</date> <url>{parse url="showtopic={$post['post']['topic_id']}&view=findpost&p={$post['post']['pid']}" template="showtopic" seotitle="{$topic['title_seo']}" base="public"}</url> <text>{$post['post']['post']}{$post['post']['attachmentHtml']}</text> <reputation>{$post['post']['rep_points']}</reputation> <if test="$post['post']['icon_id']"> <icon>{$this->settings['public_dir']}style_extra/post_icons/icon{$post['post']['icon_id']}.gif</icon> </if> <user> <if test="$post['author']['member_id']"> <id>{$post['author']['member_id']}</id> <name>{$post['author']['members_display_name']}</name> <url>{parse url="showuser={$post['author']['member_id']}" base="public" template="showuser" seotitle="{$post['author']['members_seo_name']}"}</url> <online>{$post['author']['_online']}</online> {parse template="userInfoPane" group="global" params="$post['author'], $post['post']['pid'], array()"} <else /> <id>0</id> <name>{$post['author']['members_display_name']}</name> </if> </user> <if test="$post['post']['edit_by']"> <edited> <reason>{$post['post']['post_edit_reason']}</reason> <by>{$post['post']['edit_by']}</by> </edited> </if> <signature> <!#^#|CDATA| {$post['post']['signature']} |#^#]> </signature> </post> </foreach> </if> </posts> {$topic['SHOW_PAGES']} </topic> </forum>
<if test="is_array( $displayData['active_users'] ) AND count( $displayData['active_users'] )"> <activeusers> <total>{parse expression="intval( $displayData['active_users']['members'] + $displayData['active_users']['guests'] + $displayData['active_users']['anon'] )"}</total> <guests>{$displayData['active_users']['guests']}</guests> <anonymous>{$displayData['active_users']['anon']}</anonymous> <if test="is_array( $displayData['active_users']['names'] ) AND count( $displayData['active_users']['names'] )"> <users> <foreach loop="$displayData['active_users']['names'] as $p => $r"> <user> <id>{$r['id']}</id> <name>{$r['p_start']}{$r['name']}{$r['p_end']}</name> <url>{parse url="showuser={$r['id']}" seotitle="{$r['seo']}" template="showuser" base="public"}</url> </user> </foreach> </users> </if> </activeusers> </if>
